name: Jay Mahadeokar
body:
### Info
I am a member of the Yahoo Computer vision and Machine learning group in Sunnyvale. Earlier was part of Yahoo! Labs team in Bangalore. 
Previously done summer internships with Sun Microsystems and Google Summer of Code 2011 project with pgRouting/ OSGeo.
Interests: Deep learning, Machine Learning, Big data, Computer Vision

### Publications
*  [Short-Text Representation using Diffusion Wavelets](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2577345) WWW 2014 (Companion).
* [Faster replacement paths algorithms in case of edge or node failure for undirected, positive integer weighted graphs](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2563742.2564384), Journal of Discrete Algorithms, Nov 2013.

[To be edited..]
